Texts.Chs: 不要忘了升级军备作坊，只要你有足够的资源。 这是绝对值得的。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to upgrade this station whenever you have the resources to do so. It is absolutely worth the effort.

Texts.Chs: 有了^orange;军备作坊^reset;，你才可以制作武器和盔甲。每次升级军备作坊，都能大开你的眼界。现在就尝试建造^orange;军备作坊^reset;吧。 你需要把^orange;研究^reset;拓展到^orange;武器护甲^reset;上。
Texts.Eng: With an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; you can fashion weapons and armor. Upgraded, it provides tons of variety. Try building an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; now. You'll need to ^orange;Research^reset; into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset;.
